pageContext.claim: “Since I took office, the Department of Agriculture committed investing over $6.1 billion to rebuild. Think of that -- $6.1 billion to rebuild and improve the rural water infrastructure.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump may be mixing up million and billion. A recent budget draft recommended $614 million for rural water and wastewater projects. In 2019, the agency invested $201 million in water infrastructure and awarded $1.8 billion in loans and grants, but that is nowhere near $6.1 billion.
